adrFormatAddress: 813 8th Ave, New York, NY 10019, USA

editorialSummary.text: Happening tavern drawing a pre-theater crowd for its selection of draft beers & elevated pub fare.

originalText.text:
West End Bar and Grill, nestled in the vibrant landscape of New York City, presents a classic and inviting pub-style experience. The establishment's ambiance exudes a comfortable and welcoming vibe, making it an appealing destination for those seeking a laid-back yet lively atmosphere.

The menu at West End Bar and Grill showcases a range of pub fare, with highlights on burgers, sandwiches, and appetizers. While the offerings provide a satisfying array of comfort food, some patrons may find the selection to be more standard compared to other dining options in the city. The establishment's commitment to delivering classic pub favorites is evident, catering to those who appreciate familiarity in their culinary choices.

One of the standout features of West End Bar and Grill is its friendly and attentive staff, contributing to a positive overall dining experience. The service adds a personal touch, creating an environment where patrons feel valued and well-taken care of.

In terms of libations, the establishment offers a good selection of drinks, including both alcoholic and non-alcoholic options. Whether you're looking for a craft beer, a signature cocktail, or a refreshing non-alcoholic beverage, West End Bar and Grill has options to suit various preferences.

Considering the competitive dining scene in New York, the prices at West End Bar and Grill are reasonable, making it an attractive choice for those looking for a casual yet enjoyable meal or drinks with friends. While it may not push culinary boundaries, the establishment excels in providing a familiar and comforting pub experience in the heart of the city.

originalText.text:
Expected a bit more than just Salmon and Rice when it came out, the tacos were a bit of a let down also, desserts seem to have more effort from the kitchen. The prices are also up there.
Service staff were excellent though.

Service staff were excellent though.

originalText.text: Short staff (12.26.23), but the food was good! I ordered tacos and I really liked.

text.text: Short staff (12.26.23), but the food was good! I ordered tacos and I really liked.

originalText.text: It's my first trip to New York after a long long absence. Guess what? The mother goose is back! ðŸ˜† how gorgeous can a bloody Mary be? Well, it's bloody gorgeous Mary!! I enjoyed it thoroughly. I know it's a thing for some time now, somebody has literally made BM a full meal. The espresso is a bit of a let down however. It isn't authentic espresso as the creme is just non existent. Overall the service is great, the servers are attentive, the drinks are good. I came here with a friend and certainly am pleasantly surprised. The lunch crowd seems to be having a wonderful time. I am unsure about the quality of the food as we didn't order any, for the drinks and people watching alone, it's well worth a visit. Oh, did I mention the Bloody Mary was good? ðŸ˜†

originalText.text:
This is a standard Time Square / West Side restaurant catering mainly to tourists to the area. Grabbed a bite here before seeing a Broadway show last week.

The food and service are fine. Bloody Mary was good and food was filling. Just be prepared to pay mid Manhattan prices for everything.
